author: @anthonymckeown3903
text: A point about Matt Delahunty: I agree that he direct  his intellectual energies to a more worthwhile cause, but since he was heavily in fundamentalist christianity when younger, and perhaps he's motivated by the urge to save others from making the same mistake.

author: @dcorgard
text:
First, happy birthday, Eddie!

Second, I did not hear that about the protests w.r.t. NATO and Ukraine! That's nuts! The protests weren't supposed to be about that, right? Heck, those same people probably want USAID and VoA back, too!

Third... even with a $1T annual War budget (and that's just the amount they disclose...), we still couldn't even win a war against a people whose best weapons were little more than RPGs and IEDs!

replies.author: @mimosveta
replies.text: that's what they mean by "foreign aid" - the only "aid" ever sent to foreign nation by usa, is weapons of mass destruction. but people think that aid in usaid is aid, so that's probably what they mean
